text:
March 9, 19%
Mrs, f^rtrude Broderick
U,S, Office of Education
Washington, D,C,
Dear Mrs, Broderick:
On the 9th of December last, I sent a dupliÂ¬
cated memo to all officers and directors of AEHT
requesting some biographical information. Attached
to the memo was a form which I requested be filled
out and returned to this office.
For some reason, probably due to the Christmas
mail rush, I do not seem to have a completed form
on file for you,
.I am enclosing another one of these blanks and
I would greatly appreciate it if you would fill it
in and return it to me at your early convenience.
Kindest personal regards.
Sincerely,
John Adams Hourke
JAHsle National Membership Chairman
Enc, AEHT
